Professional Behaviour Support Enquiries

I'm here to discuss how behaviour support can help achieve your NDIS goals. Whether you're a participant, family member, or provider, I offer a free initial consultation to explore your needs and how I can support you.

Frequently Asked Questions

How quickly will you respond?

I typically respond to enquiries within 24-48 hours during business days.

Do you offer free consultations?

Yes, I offer a free 30-minute initial consultation to discuss your needs and how I can help.

What areas do you service?

I provide behaviour support services across Australia, both remotely and in-person where possible.

Can I contact you after hours?

My standard hours are 9-5 AEST, but I can arrange after-hours appointments for urgent matters.

‚ÑπÔ∏è

Registration & Service Delivery

My application is currently under assessment by the NDIS Quality and Safeguards Commission (Alternate Pathway). Where services are delivered, they are delivered under supervision and through an appropriately registered organisation, in line with applicable NDIS requirements. Independent delivery under my own NDIS registration will commence following approval.

Emergency Situations

This website is not monitored for urgent matters. If there is immediate risk to someone's safety or an emergency situation, please call 000 for emergency services.

For urgent behaviour support needs, contact your current service provider or the NDIS Quality and Safeguards Commission on 1800 035 544.
